welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Amersham, known for its beautiful countryside, historic buildings, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our lovely city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, mainly used for domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, designed for international flights and equipped with modern facilities.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the busiest terminals at Heathrow Airport, serving a mix of long-haul and short-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for SkyTeam alliance airlines, with a wide range of duty-free shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, exclusively used by British Airways and Iberia.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then a fee applies for longer usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Benson Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Blackbushe Airport offers exclusive services for private aircraft and their passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport offers a modern and luxurious travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to VIP and private jet passengers, providing exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Centre
terminals.description: The Private Jet Centre at London City Airport offers VIP services for private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
